title: Tokens not aligned error when spacy < 2.3.0
body:
## Description of the bug

"Tokens are not aligned!" RuntimeError happens at `HocrVisualParser.parse`

## To Reproduce
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Use the latest commit (a2d097be6f6509214a93246ad8027aeed509ba65)
2. Parse [William_R._King.hocr.txt](https://github.com/HazyResearch/fonduer/files/5427085/William_R._King.hocr.txt) with `HOCRDocPreprocessor` and `HocrVisualParser`

## Expected behavior

Parse without an error

## Error Logs/Screenshots

```
[ERROR] Document William_R._King not added to database, because of parse error: 
('Tokens are not aligned!', 'hocr tokens: [\'Who\', \'is\', \'William\', \'Rufus\', \'King?\', "\'\'", \'Obituary\', \'addresses\', \'on\', \'the\', \'occasion\', \'of\', \'the\', \'death\', \'of\', \'the\', \'Hon.\', \'William\', \'R.\', \'King,\', \'of\', \'Alabama,\', \'vice-president\', \'of\', \'the\', \'United\', \'States\', \':\', \'delivered\', \'in\', \'the\', \'Senate\', \'and\', \'House\', \'of\', \'Representatives\', \'of\', \'the\', \'United\', \'States,\', \'eighth\', \'of\', \'December,\', "1853\'\'"]', 'spacy tokens: [\'Who\', \'is\', \'William\', \'Rufus\', \'King\', \'?\', "\'\'", \'Obituary\', \'addresses\', \'on\', \'the\', \'occasion\', \'of\', \'the\', \'death\', \'of\', \'the\', \'Hon\', \'.\', \'William\', \'R.\', \'King\', \',\', \'of\', \'Alabama\', \',\', \'vice\', \'-\', \'president\', \'of\', \'the\', \'United\', \'States\', \':\', \'delivered\', \'in\', \'the\', \'Senate\', \'and\', \'House\', \'of\', \'Representatives\', \'of\', \'the\', \'United\', \'States\', \',\', \'eighth\', \'of\', \'December\', \',\', \'1853\', "\'", "\'"]')
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Users/hiromu/workspace/fonduer/src/fonduer/parser/parser.py", line 246, in apply
    document.name, document.sentences
  File "/Users/hiromu/workspace/fonduer/src/fonduer/parser/parser.py", line 244, in <listcomp>
    y
  File "/Users/hiromu/workspace/fonduer/src/fonduer/parser/visual_parser/hocr_visual_parser.py", line 134, in parse
    f"spacy tokens: {spacy_tokens}",
RuntimeError: ('Tokens are not aligned!', 'hocr tokens: [\'Who\', \'is\', \'William\', \'Rufus\', \'King?\', "\'\'", \'Obituary\', \'addresses\', \'on\', \'the\', \'occasion\', \'of\', \'the\', \'death\', \'of\', \'the\', \'Hon.\', \'William\', \'R.\', \'King,\', \'of\', \'Alabama,\', \'vice-president\', \'of\', \'the\', \'United\', \'States\', \':\', \'delivered\', \'in\', \'the\', \'Senate\', \'and\', \'House\', \'of\', \'Representatives\', \'of\', \'the\', \'United\', \'States,\', \'eighth\', \'of\', \'December,\', "1853\'\'"]', 'spacy tokens: [\'Who\', \'is\', \'William\', \'Rufus\', \'King\', \'?\', "\'\'", \'Obituary\', \'addresses\', \'on\', \'the\', \'occasion\', \'of\', \'the\', \'death\', \'of\', \'the\', \'Hon\', \'.\', \'William\', \'R.\', \'King\', \',\', \'of\', \'Alabama\', \',\', \'vice\', \'-\', \'president\', \'of\', \'the\', \'United\', \'States\', \':\', \'delivered\', \'in\', \'the\', \'Senate\', \'and\', \'House\', \'of\', \'Representatives\', \'of\', \'the\', \'United\', \'States\', \',\', \'eighth\', \'of\', \'December\', \',\', \'1853\', "\'", "\'"]')
```

## Environment (please complete the following information)
 - OS: macOS 10.15.6
 - PostgreSQL Version: N/A
 - Poppler Utils Version: N/A
 - Fonduer Version: 0.8.4+dev (a2d097be6f6509214a93246ad8027aeed509ba65)
 - spaCy: 2.2.4

## Additional context
Add any other context about the problem here.

This error does not happen when spacy >= 2.3.0
